1/* Id: test-wchar.c,v 1.5 2018/08/15 02:15:52 schwarze Exp */

17
18#include <locale.h>
19#include <stdio.h>
20#include <wchar.h>
21#include <unistd.h>
22
23int
24main(void)
25{
26 wchar_t wc;
27 int width;
28
29 if (setlocale(LC_ALL, "") == NULL) {
30 fputs("setlocale(LC_ALL, \"\") failed\n", stderr);
31 return 1;
32 }
33
34 if (setlocale(LC_CTYPE, UTF8_LOCALE) == NULL) {
35 fprintf(stderr, "setlocale(LC_CTYPE, \"%s\") failed\n",
36 UTF8_LOCALE);
37 return 1;
38 }
39
40 if (sizeof(wchar_t) < 4) {
41 fprintf(stderr, "wchar_t is only %zu bytes\n",
42 sizeof(wchar_t));
43 return 1;
44 }
45
46 if ((width = wcwidth(L' ')) != 1) {
47 fprintf(stderr, "wcwidth(L' ') returned %d\n", width);
48 return 1;
49 }
50
51 dup2(STDERR_FILENO, STDOUT_FILENO);
52 wc = L'*';
53 if (putwchar(wc) != (wint_t)wc) {
54 fputs("bad putwchar return value\n", stderr);
55 return 1;
56 }
57
58 return 0;
59}
60
